SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.jgentleframework.integration.remoting.rmi.annotation
Annotation Type RmiExporterConfig

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface RmiExporterConfig

Provides information about the RmiExporter

Author:
Quoc Chung - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com

Optional Element Summary
 java.lang.String exporterID
          The specified ID of RMI service exporter which is responsible for rmi service exporting.
 Scope scope
          Represents the scope of RMI Exporter.
 

exporterID

public abstract java.lang.String exporterID
The specified ID of RMI service exporter which is responsible for rmi service exporting. The corresponding scope of RMI service exporter is default specified Scope.SINGLETON.

The default value will be RemoteDefaultID.DEFAULT_RMIEXPORTER_ID

Default:
"a1fcb6b911f635150b0e0e1c61234321887147_DEFAULT_RMIEXPORTER_ID"

scope

public abstract Scope scope
Represents the scope of RMI Exporter.

Default value is Scope.SINGLETON

Default:
org.jgentleframework.configure.enums.Scope.SINGLETON
